reviewText: A bit cheesy. Actors over exaggerate expressions. Nice DVD Interface though. Short vignettes good. OK productions values. Probably best for Police Departments. An introduction to concepts. Better DVDs out there.

A bit much.. other videos are better. not bad just not good for HS students
i ended up turning it off in the middle of it.

Pretty expensive for what it is.  It had very general information,  move of an overview in my opinion.  It seemed to be geared more towards corporate business types or police. I was hoping for something different.
All DVDs that I ordered came in one package in a short period of time. These DVDs are good educational DVDs if you want to learn and understand basic body language. I'm glad I bought these DVDs.
There are not too many body language DVD's out there.  This video really helps and goes over the basics.  It is pretty pricey for the length of it but the info is well worth it.
